00001 """
00002 Qsos evaluation's wrapper.
00003 
00004 This module defines the document object.
00005 """
00006 ##
00007 #    @author Hery Randriamanamihaga
00008 #    @defgroup document Document
00009 #    @ingroup Engine
00010 
00011 from family import *
00012 
00013 ##
00014 #    @ingroup document
00015 #
00016 class Document :
00017     """
00018     Python wrapper for QSOS document
00019     """
00020     
00021     def __init__(self, properties, families):
00022         """
00023         Initializer
00024         @param properties
00025             Document properties list
00026         @param families
00027             Application families list
00028         """
00029         self.properties = properties
00030         self.families = families
00031     
00032     def __getitem__(self,key):
00033         """
00034         Accessor
00035         
00036         This getter recognizes the following expressions :
00037             - properties
00038             - families
00039             - family.key
00040                 <br>Where key can be :
00041                     - dateofcreation
00042                     - dateofvalidation
00043                     - authors
00044                     - [element].score
00045                     - [element].comments
00046         
00047         @param self
00048             Pointer to the object
00049         @param key
00050             The key to get
00051         @return
00052             The requested object
00053         """
00054         #Get properties of family and families sub components
00055         if key == "properties":
00056             return self.properties
00057         elif key == "families":
00058             return self.families
00059         else :
00060             try :
00061                 args = key.split(".") 
00062                 return self.families[args[0]][".".join(args[1:])]
00063             except ValueError :
00064                 return self.families[key]
00065             except KeyError :
00066                 print "No key %s found in %s dictionnary of family %s" %        \
00067                          (args[1], args[2], args[0])
00068         
00069         
00070
